009package imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.line;
010
011import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
012import imagingbook.common.geometry.line.AlgebraicLine;
013
014public interface LineFit {
015        
016        public abstract int getSize();
017        
018        /**
019         * Returns the parameters [A, B, C] for the {@link AlgebraicLine}
020         * associated with this line fit. To be implemented by concrete
021         * classes. {@code null} is returned if no fit was found.
022         * 
023         * @return algebraic line parameters [A, B, C]
024         * @see AlgebraicLine
025         */
026        public abstract double[] getLineParameters();
027
028        /**
029         * Returns the {@link AlgebraicLine} associated with this line fit.
030         * {@code null} is returned if no fit was found.
031         * 
032         * @return an {@link AlgebraicLine} instance
033         */
034        public default AlgebraicLine getLine() {
035                double[] p = this.getLineParameters();
036                if (p == null) {
037                        return null;
038                }
039                else {
040                        return new AlgebraicLine(p);
041                }
042        }
043        
044        /**
045         * Calculates and returns the sum of the squared orthogonal distances
046         * of the specified points for this line fit.
047         * 
048         * @param points an array of 2D points
049         * @return the squared orthogonal error
050         */
051        public default double getSquaredOrthogonalError(Pnt2d[] points) {
052                AlgebraicLine line = getLine();
053                return line.getSquareError(points);
054        }
055}
